kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Random Element
kw.doc: Generate a randomly sampled object from ``elements``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and/or ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Criar DataMass de Novo Usuário Estatico
Load Json From File
kw.doc: Load JSON from file.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Copy Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a copy of the given dictionary.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and/or ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=severest, url=http://localhost:3000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '97', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "Daniel", "email": "Helen@gmail.com", "password": "%yO&KHK^D5", "administrador": "true"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Mensagem de status: {'message': 'Cadastro realizado com sucesso', '_id': 'lD9fxjl4XSSwHgo1'}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
